channel.title: Mariano Abdala
channel.description: Writings of Mariano Abdala. iOS Developer, host at @NSCoderBA and organizer at @NSConfArg.

item.title: Hello
item.description:
I know, I know. I shouldn’t be switching my blog’s url and name so often.

But Tumblr wasn’t doing such a great job at hosting my posts… and I just decided I’d go lean, start over, hell, why not?

You can find my previous writings here:
mariano.zerously.com (2013-2015)
mythirdblog (2007-2010)

I tried importing them, redirecting them, renaming them and honestly, it isn’t wasn’t worth it.

I’ll save you some time, here are my favorite posts from my past blogs:
Planning to get rid of my PC
5 phases to become a happy programmer
iOS push notifications sends user-untraceable sounds
Keeping badges updated
Just this
A proposed technique for offering users assistance in the event of a crash
Best tool for making difficult decisions
Hosting an NSCoder
Best desktop I’ve ever had
Best desktop I’ve ever had, yet

Have fun.
